author: english.ahram.org.eg
title: Palestinian teen killed by Israel army fire: Police, Medics - Region - World
text:
Related Israeli air raid hits Gaza after rocket attack: Army Israel bars Palestinians from Jerusalem Old City after attacks Palestinian shot dead after killing two in Jerusalem: Police 10 Palestinians wounded as Israel hunts settlers' killers Israeli army fire killed a 13-year-old Palestinian during clashes at a refugee camp near Bethlehem on Monday as violence spiked in east Jerusalem and the occupied West Bank, police and emergency services said.
Abdel Rahman Abdullah was hit by a gunshot in the chest, the sources said. He is the second Palestinian killed by Israeli soldiers over the past 24 hours as clashes have spread.
